Mustex: We just got here ourselfs. We did get a satelite lanched into 
orbit before we crashed, and it tells us there are more transformers 
on this planet. Maybe hundreds. We found a large deposite of energon 
not far from here. Other than that we don't have a clue about squat. 
Oh this is Stallex. Get over here kid.

Stallex walks over

Stallex: Hi.

Mustex: There's another bot named Rhesus back at our crashed shuttle.

an
